name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your damaging spells have a chance to draw a minion from the satchel, sending it running at your target where it explodes, dealing 282,531 Shadow damage split between all nearby enemies.

Damage is increased for each enemy struck, up to 5 enemies.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 100,787 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
